answers.answer: my twin sister had high blood pressure and everything was fine delevered a healthy 7 pound lil boy he will be 8 months next week
I had h/p with my son everything went great,but did induce early because of it. This time around I have my good days and bad days. But it hasnt been too high.....
I had preeclampsia with my second delivered 10 days early by induction. With third and fourth I was put on labetalol. Everything was great but I was put on bed rest for a few weeks w/# 2&3.
I had high blood pressure, ended up having an emergency induction, and delivered a healthy 8 pound 9 ounce boy!

question: went to the dr today and found out im have very high blood pressure my ob put me on some pills to take 3 times a day she says everything is looking good. after a M/C in jan 2008 at 8 weeks this baby is fine, she couldnt hear the heartbeat so she did a U/S to make sure things were good. the baby heartbeat was normal and was bouncing all around like crazy. has anyone experience high blood pressure while pregnant and things went well?
title: 10weeks 2days pregnant and high blood pressure
